name: Well Race
description:
Race to the finish and avoid obstacles in your way. Can you reach zero deaths???!!!!

The one who manages to win 10 times, wins the game.

An Atari 2600-style game.

Controls:

ESC: To go back to the main menu.

P1:

W to Jump

A and D to move

P2:

Arrow Up to jump

Arrow Left and Arrow Right to move.

Reporting Bugs & Source Code:

Please report bugs at https://github.com/ThomasAunvik/Well-Race
